Aquaman bụ ihe nkiri dike America nke 2018 dabere na agwa DC nke otu aha ahụ
Emepụtara ya site na DC Entertainment na Peter Safran Productions, ma kesaa ya site na Warner Bros
Pictures, ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke isii na DC Extended Universe (DCEU)
James Wan na-eduzi ihe nkiri a, site na ihe nkiri David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick na Will Beall
Ọ na-eme Jason Momoa dị ka Arthur Curry / Aquaman, onye ga-eduzi Alaeze Atlantis ma kwụsị nwanne ya nwoke, King Orm, ime ka alaeze asaa dị n'okpuru mmiri dị n'otu iji bibie ụwa elu
Amber Heard, Willem Dafoe, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, na Nicole Kidman pụtara na ọrụ nkwado.￼
